```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(flexdashboard)
library(d3treeR)
library(tidyverse)
library(janitor)
library(plotly)
library(forcats)
library(treemap)
```

```{r}
data_instacart = 
  read_csv("instacart_train_data.csv.zip") %>%
  clean_names()

# unique departments
departmet_u = 
  data_instacart %>%
  select(department) %>%
  distinct()
```


Column {.sidebar}
-----------------------------------------------------------------------

```{r selectInput widget}
departmet_u = 
  data_instacart %>%
  select(department) %>%
  distinct() %>%
  pull()

# selectInput widget
selectInput("dep_choice", label = h3("Select department"),
            choices = departmet_u, selected = "produce")
```

```{r}
max_top = 10
min_top = 1
  
# sliderInput widget
sliderInput("top_n", label = h4("Choose top n"), 
            min = min_top, max = max_top, value = 5)
```



Column {data-width=650}
-----------------------------------------------------------------------

### Chart A

```{r}
renderD3tree({
  data_instacart %>% 
  filter(department == input$dep_choice) %>%
  group_by(aisle) %>%
  summarize(n = n()) %>% 
  treemap(index = c("aisle"), vSize = "n", type = "index")
})
```

### Chart B

```{r}
renderPlotly({
p =
  data_instacart %>% 
  filter(!is.na(days_since_prior_order)) %>%
  filter(department == input$dep_choice) %>%
  count(product_name) %>% 
  arrange(desc(n)) %>%
  head(input$top_n) %>%
  inner_join(x = data_instacart, y = .) %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x = add_to_cart_order, y = days_since_prior_order, group = product_name, color = product_name)) +
  geom_smooth(se = FALSE) +
  theme_classic() +
  theme(legend.position = "bottom")

  ggplotly(p)
})
```

Column {data-width=350}
-----------------------------------------------------------------------

### Chart C

```{r}
renderPlotly({
  data_instacart %>%
  filter(department == input$dep_choice) %>%
  count(product_name) %>% 
  arrange(desc(n)) %>%
  head(input$top_n) %>%
  mutate(product_name = fct_reorder(product_name, n)) %>% 
  plot_ly(x = ~product_name, y = ~n, color = ~product_name, 
          type = "bar")
})
```

### Chart D

```{r}
renderPlotly({
  top_products =
  data_instacart %>%
  filter(department == input$dep_choice) %>%
  count(product_name) %>% 
  arrange(desc(n)) %>%
  head(input$top_n) 
  
  top_products = inner_join(top_products, data_instacart)  
  
 top_products %>%
  mutate(product_name = fct_reorder(product_name, order_hour_of_day, IQR)) %>% 
  plot_ly(x = ~product_name, y = ~ order_hour_of_day, color = ~product_name,
          colors = "Set2",
          type = "box") 
})
```
